file.name: servicenow_api.yaml
file.content:
basePath: /
components:
  securitySchemes:
    BasicAuth:
      scheme: basic
      type: http
host: tenant.service-now.com
info:

    url: https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme
  description: service-now
  title: Servicenow API
  version: '1.0'
  x-categories:
  - Cases
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.0

        name: body
        required: false

      requestBody:
        content:
          example:
            example: table_name=${table}&table_sys_id=${sys_id}
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              properties:
                fieldname:
                  type: string
                  value: uploadFile
              type: object
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
      responses:
        default:
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                example: "{\n  \"result\": {\n    \"table_sys_id\": \"d71f7935c0a8016700802b64c67c11c6\"\

                  ,\n    \"sys_mod_count\": \"0\",\n    \"content_type\": \"image/jpeg\"\
                  ,\n    \"size_compressed\": \"25130\"\n  }\n}"

          description: default
